input_text:
Job Title: Demand Generation Manager

Location: Massachusetts, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Advertising, Information Technology, Marketing

Description:
Job description:

 Company Description The mission of ArisGlobal is to empower life science organizations to deliver breakthroughs faster, more accurately, and with greater precision. ArisGlobal's software, services, and technologies are essential to the delivery of life-saving medications. As an industry leader, ArisGlobal offers software as a service for Clinical Trials, Regulatory Affairs, Drug Safety, and Medical Affairs.   Our products are utilized by 40 out of 50 major biopharmaceutical companies. Among our clients are four out of five of the world's most advanced global pharmaceutical companies and nine government-health authorities, including the FDA, Health Canada, and the National Medical Products Administration. You would be joining at team that is aggressively developing technologies that leverage GenAI and automation in life sciences R&D to benefit humankind. Position Summary We are looking for a rockstar Manager/Sr. Manager of Demand Generation to be part of hungry and humble team of marketers. The ideal candidate has B2B SaaS experience (life sciences/pharma/healthcare a plus) and is well-versed in creating data-driven campaigns and programs that support marketing KPIs and ultimately – revenue.  Responsibilities Leverage your demand gen and marcomm smarts to develop and execute short- and long-term multi-channel campaigns/programs to drive leads into the sales pipelineCo-lead A/B testing strategies and execution across all channelsMonitor and optimize campaigns and programs that leverage digital-first channels such as email, SEM, SEO, and paid and organic socialDevelop prospect buyer journeys and understand how and where buyers look for information, how they buy Assist in email content development as needed, targeting prospects throughout the buying journeyWork with a team of other sharp digital marketing professionals, collaborating with other departments, such as sales, sales enablement, product and product marketing Conduct ongoing research to better identify target audiences and how to reach themTrack, report, and analyze program performance, make recommendations for further improvement  Things that Set You Apart: You are hungry, yet humble You’re not afraid to dig into data to help drive decisions You can influence and secure buy-in from others, pushing towards a common goalYou have Pardot marketing automation experience and are willing and able to own executing programs within itYou can demonstrate success running and reporting on demand generation programs that garnered tangible results for the business You possess a positive, solutions-minded approach to your working environment and fellow colleagues You don’t just care about the number of MQLs you produce - you care about the SQLs that result   Your Experience 5-10 years of marketing experience, preferably for B2B companies, with a heavy emphasis on driving demand – Previous demand generation role(s) a mustMinimum bachelor’s degree in marketing or similarProven ability to drive MQLs that convert to SQLs and qualified pipe Pardot experience strongly preferred. Experience managing and monitoring performance/effectiveness digital marketing programs primarily leveraging email, SEM, SEO, and socialAnalytical thinking skills - using data to drive strategy and focus effortsGood communication skills (verbal and written)  Benefits ArisGlobal proudly offers an Impressive Package of Compensation and Benefits. The following benefits are available for full-time Team Members in the United States. Other benefits may apply to Team Members in other countries. Some of these include: 401(k) ADP: 3% matchCigna health, dental, vision: day onePaid maternity + paternity leaveEmployee referral program – cash bonus’PTO (18 days) + Holidays (10 days) = 28 days year-one!Optional FSA + HSA's, Non-med insurances + Teledoc + pet insurance + theft protection + more..  ArisGlobal is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts with offices located in more than 9 countries around the world. Please check out our website/LinkedIn to find out more information about the organization and other available positions.    *ArisGlobal is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and considers all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected class

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Demand Generation Manager
output_json.summary: A rockstar Manager/Sr. Manager of Demand Generation is sought after to join a team of marketers, with expertise in B2B SaaS, particularly in life sciences/pharma/healthcare.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in marketing or similar
optional_skills: Collaboration with sales, sales enablement, product, and product marketing teams
job_responsibilities: Develop and execute short- and long-term multi-channel campaigns/programs to drive leads into the sales pipeline
Co-lead A/B testing strategies and execution across all channels
Monitor and optimize campaigns and programs leveraging digital-first channels
Understand how and where buyers look for information
Conduct ongoing research to identify target audiences
Track, report, and analyze program performance
Conduct research to identify target audiences
Ensure alignment with marketing KPIs and revenue goals
benefits: Cigna health, dental, and vision coverage
Employee referral program with cash bonuses
PTO (18 days) + holidays (10 days) = 28 days per year
output_json.company_information: ArisGlobal is a leader in providing software, services, and technologies for clinical trials, regulatory affairs, drug safety, and medical affairs. It serves over 40 major biopharmaceutical companies and collaborates with four out of five of the world's most advanced global pharmaceutical companies and nine government-health authorities, including the FDA, Health Canada, and the National Medical Products Administration.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: ArisGlobal is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and considers all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected class.

other.content: Impressive package of compensation and benefits available for full-time Team Members in the United States, including but not limited to 401(k) plan, health insurance, paid leave, employee referral program, PTO, and various optional insurance plans.
